ContactInformation.name: Name
ContactInformation.email_help: We will not spam you; we need a valid email to contact you back

Logo.logo_help: Do you have a logo? Please Upload it here. If you have a vectorial version (.ai/.eps/.svg), it's better, but if you don't, please make sure you're sending us the largest image you have. You can select multiple files

Branding.choice: How would you like to choose your colors?

choices.handpicked: I want to hand pick my colors
choices.api: I want to choose a color scheme
choices.none: I want synclop to choose colors for me

api.label: Color Scheme
api.help: search for a color scheme here, enter any word you like

Branding.none: ok, synclop will take care of your colors for you

DomainName.choice: How do you want to pick your domain name?

choices.handpicked: I already have a domain name
choices.api: I do not have domain name, show me suggestions
choices.none: I want synclop to choose a domain name for me

api.label: Domain
api.help: Enter your desired domain name here. You will be presented with available suggestions. You can buy the domain directly, or just pick it and let Synclop take care of formalities

DomainName.none: ok, synclop will take care of your domain name for you

Notes.notes_help: If you want to leave us a note or ask a question, write it here

Recap.text: Please make sure everything is correct
